entities.departureInfo: 129 Rue Saint-Antoine

descriptions.shortDescription: Come take an insiders stroll through the lovely Marais, one of the oldest and historical areas of Paris. Marais expert Richard Nahem (he has lived in the area since 2005) will share with you breathtaking, historic buildings and private mansions dating back to the 1600s, beautiful manicured parks and gardens and some of the finest galleries and small, jewel-like museums. Discover the city’s chicest home and clothing boutiques and food lovers can feast at some of the top food shops, patisseries, and chocolate shops. The tour also includes a visit to the Jewish Quarter exploring synagogues, the Shoah Memorial, and the tasty Jewish food shops. Enjoy this unforgettable tour of a truly magical part of Paris. Tour includes a stop at an award winning bakery for a pastry and a coffee. (Not included in price).

entities.name: Three Hour Marais Tour

entities.departureInfo: Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Experience the heady nightlife of Paris with a three-course dinner and show at the Paris Moulin Rouge, home of the French Cancan in bohemian Montmartre. Wine and dine while watching the Moulin Rouge's brilliant new show, "Feerie", the essence of Parisian cabaret. While at the Moulin Rouge you'll enjoy fine traditional French food such as foie gras, pate or fine seafood. Your tour includes transportation to Moulin Rouge by air-conditioned coach from a central Paris location.

entities.name: Paris Moulin Rouge Dinner Show with Transport

entities.departureInfo: Musee du Louvre, 75001 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: This semi-private (8 guest maximum) Louvre and Musée d’Orsay guided museum tour, allows you to experience Paris’s two major museums all in a half day. And they said it couldn’t be done! Join our guides and skip the line to spend 5 to 5.5 hours immersed in the treasures of these two iconic museums with one of our energetic and enthusiastic guides.

entities.name: Louvre & Orsay Museums Skip-the-line Semi-Private Guided Combo Tour

entities.departureInfo: Traveler pickup is offeredExact Pick-up time sent 24h before departure, Pick-up at your hotel/apartment everywhere inside Paris

descriptions.shortDescription: Discover the region of Champagne in one day on this tour from Paris. You'll enjoy guided visits and tastings at renowned Champagne houses such as Moët and Chandon, Veuve Clicquot, or Taittinger, as well as smaller wineries, plus have lunch at a family-run estate. Take advantage of this opportunity to explore vineyards, walk through chalk cellars, and learn about this legendary sparkling wine. This 11-hour tour is by minivan with a guide, who specializes in wine and Champagne and shares knowledge and anecdotes. Enjoy an amazing overview of Champagne’s vineyards during a Masterclass animated by your wine expert guide (depending on weather conditions from April). You will taste one special cuvee and learn each of its specificities. The Champagne tasting will not have any more secrets for you ! Besides, small-group tour limited to eight people ensures personalized attention.

entities.name: Champagne Area Small Group Day Trip with 8 Tastings & Lunch from Paris

entities.departureInfo: 1: 47ter Boulevard Saint-Germain, 75005 Paris, France2: 5 Place Blanche, 75009 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Select either the morning tour of the Latin Quarter or the afternoon tour of Montmartre, and get ready to discover French gastronomy and history. 

 Numbers on this gourmet walking tour are restricted to a maximum of eight, ensuring you'll receive individual attention from your expert gastronomic guide. The number of stops you make could be expanded according to the seasonal availability of produce and your group's preferences.

The commentary from your expert foodie guide includes an overview of French culinary habits, a description of any seasonal events taking place at the time of your tour and an introduction to selected specialties in the shops. Your guide will discuss how these specialties are produced, how to choose and store the produce, and how to prepare your own gourmet recipes. You are encouraged to interact with your guide and ask as many questions as you like.

entities.name: Paris Food Tour: French Gastronomy and History
entities.returnInfo: 1: Latin Quarter, Paris, France2: Montmartre, 75018 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: 12 Rue de l'Exposition, 75007 Paris, FranceTraveler pickup is offeredOption 1 | Price : 125 € per person Pick-up from the hotel or Residence only in Paris zip codes 75001-75020 Morning Tour : Pick-up from 7:30 to 8:00 Afternoon Tour : Pick-up from 11:30 to 12:00 Return from Giverny to your Hotel or Residence in ParisOption 2 | Price: 90 € per personPick-up from our Agency 12, rue de l'Exposition 75007 ParisMorning Tour : Departure at 8:00 amAfternoon Tour : Departure at 12:00 pmReturn from Giverny with a Drop-off at Champs-Elysées or Eiffel Tower

descriptions.shortDescription: Spend some time in the French countryside at Giverny with this 6-hour small-group tour and walk through the gardens that inspired Claude Monet's famous water-lilies paintings. Visit the master of impressionism's house and gardens on your own and walk through the streets of this pretty little town.

entities.name: Giverny Monet's House & Gardens Skip-the-Line Ticket & Transfer from Paris

entities.departureInfo: 1: Le Peloton Café, 17 Rue du Pont Louis-Philippe, 75004 Paris, France2: 78000 Versailles, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Here at Bike About, we’re a family. Our tours were one of the first to hit the Paris scene nearly 2 decades ago, and we like to keep that feeling of community on tour. For this reason, and unlike other bike tours of Versailles, we limit our groups to 14 people. We also warmly welcome you at our very own café, and our guide rides the train to Versailles with you- so you’re taken care of the whole way. Join our family for a day, and experience our version of Versailles!

We’ve planned an unforgettable day trip from Paris, cruising through the town of Versailles for the amazing local market, heading into Versailles’ grounds & gardens, Marie Antoinette’s village, and the Trianons. After the picnic, we make our way to the Chateau. You’ll then explore the palace at your own pace.

Our tour makes history accessible. It’s about getting the juicy important details of Versailles plus the fun stories and quirky anecdotes. It’s simply about an unforgettable day in the countryside, tickets included

entities.name: Versailles Domain Guided Day Bike Tour with Palace Entrance from Paris by Train

Book your two-way chauffeur service from either the Charles de Gaulle or Orly airport to your hotel in Paris, and a return trip to any of these two airports. High-quality service with a professional driver who will meet you at the airport after the customs with a name plate. After your stay in Paris, on the day of your departure, the driver will take you to the airport.

Customers may also be dropoffed at other Paris address (apartment, private residence, train station).

entities.name: Paris Airports Private Roundtrip Transfer

descriptions.shortDescription: Paris is fabulous by day but unforgettable by night. Don't miss the chance to take an after-dinner Paris by Night Illuminations Tour and visit the home of the Cancan, the famous Moulin Rouge. You'll tour all the illuminated Paris sights, monuments and squares en route to Montmartre and the Moulin Rouge cabaret.

entities.name: Paris by Night Illuminations Tour & Moulin Rouge Show

entities.departureInfo: Lido de Paris, 116 B avenue des Champs Elysees, 75008 Paris France

descriptions.shortDescription: Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret at the famous Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show which was created by the talented Franco Dragone. The Lido is celebrating its 75th anniversary with a new and festive programme of events full of energy and celebration! Enjoy the new dancing set "Unforgettable", a fabulous journey through the Lido's most beautiful revues. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage and talented chefs producing delicious dishes in the kitchen, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement!

entities.name: Lido de Paris Cabaret Show with Dinner or Champagne

entities.departureInfo: La Flamme, 6 Avenue de Wagram, 75008 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Enjoy a day in the French Countryside while you explore three remarkable Chateaux in the Loire Valley. Join a small group, day tour, from Paris and spend the day marvelling at the beautiful Renaissance castles of Chenonceau, Chambord, and Amboise!

entities.name: Loire Valley Three Top Castles Small-Group Day Trip with Wine Tasting

entities.departureInfo: Carousel of the Eiffel Tower, Quai Branly, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Reaffirm your feelings for your beloved in the most romantic city in the world! With this vows renewal package in Paris, meet at your chosen location in central Paris where your celebrant will read your vows. Afterward, take a stroll among the most famous landmarks of this world-class city. A professional photographer will be there every step of the way to document this amazing experience, and you’ll receive between 130-150 HD photos by email at no additional cost. If you upgrade to the video option, you'll also receive professional video footage. Don’t miss this chance to make your time in Paris truly unforgettable!

entities.name: Renew Your Wedding Vows in Paris

entities.departureInfo: Paris, Paris, Ile-de-France

descriptions.shortDescription: Meet a local chef and learn how to cook a three-course French meal in a private apartment in Paris! Numbers for this small-group Paris cooking class are limited to a maximum of 8 people, ensuring you'll receive personalized attention from your knowledgeable French cuisine and food expert.

entities.name: Small-Group French Cooking Class in Paris

entities.departureInfo: 112 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75012 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Eat your way through Paris' culinary scene on a private food tour. Go on a delicious journey as you try 10 of the best food items beloved by the locals: from savory to sweet and local drinks; this tour will leave every foodie satisfied! 

Enjoy tastings typical of the local cuisine and hand-picked by a local guide passionate about food like Cheese - Board of 3 types of cheese plus 2 types of meat and Crepe. But that's not it! This tour is more than just food; it's a cultural experience! In between food stops, you'll also find city highlights making this experience a well-rounded tour that will satisfy every foodie.

Withlocals The 10 Tastings Private Food Tour™ is one of Withlocals' signature tours available in major cities worldwide. We work with passionate local guides who earn a fair fee. We support local economies by only offering local produce and prevent over-tourism with only small non-intrusive groups. Our tours are carbon-neutral and away from the standard tourist routes.

entities.name: The 10 Tastings of Paris With Locals: Private Food Tour
entities.returnInfo: 7 Rue des Nonnains d'Hyères, 75004 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: Moulin Rouge, 82 Boulevard de Clichy, 75018 Paris France

descriptions.shortDescription:
See the world-famous Moulin Rouge show like a VIP as you watch from some of the best seats in the house! This exclusive experience at one of Paris’ top attractions allows you to enjoy the 2-hour cabaret show from one of only 24 exclusive VIP seats (premium seating), where you’ll have clear views of the exciting revue and its costumes, sets and dancing. 

This VIP night out also includes skip-the-line entry to the Moulin Rouge, free coat check, a fabulous 4-course dinner of French specialties, and a selection of fine wines and Champagne selected by the Moulin Rouge sommelier.

entities.name: Paris Moulin Rouge Show with Exclusive VIP Seating & 4-Course Dinner

entities.departureInfo: 36 Avenue de la Bourdonnais

descriptions.shortDescription:
Don’t miss the views of Paris from the Eiffel Tower at night, when the city spreads before you twinkling with light. This 4-hour combo tour gives you the chance to experience Paris in the evening in three ways: a 1-hour river cruise on the Seine, a sightseeing tour by coach and admission to the second floor of the Eiffel Tower. You’ll get oriented with top attractions like the Champs-Elysées and be part of Paris’ lively nighttime atmosphere!
- A combo package of 3 enchanting sightseeing tours of the most beautiful city of the world, without the stress 
- Picturesque views of famous Parisian monuments like the Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral & Seine River by night 
- A breathtaking panorama of the City of Lights from the 2nd floor or Summit of the Eiffel Tower ( if option is selected)
- A romantic commented night cruise along the beautiful Seine River

entities.name: Eiffel Tower with Optional Summit Access, Seine River Cruise and Paris City Tour
entities.returnInfo: Tour Eiffel - Parc du Champ-de-Mars, 75007 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: Bateaux Parisiens, Port de la Bourdonnais, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Cruise through the heart of Paris on this 1-hour Bateaux Parisiens tour by luxury sightseeing boat. While gliding along the UNESCO World Heritage-listed banks of the River Seine, you’ll see legendary Paris attractions such as Notre Dame Cathedral and pass beneath elegant bridges like Pont Neuf. Listen to audio commentary and learn all about the sights and history of the city on this must-do Paris cruise!

entities.name: Bateaux Parisiens Seine River Sightseeing Cruise

entities.departureInfo: Louvre Pyramid, 75001 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Due to its immense size and the thousands of pieces in its collection, the Louvre is best explored and appreciated in a short amount of time on a privately guided tour. We offer a 1-hour 30 minute private tour for your group which allows you to experience this famed destination under the supervision of an expert guide. They will tailor the tour to your desires and speed, or get you right to the museum's most famous highlights - including the Mona Lisa. The tour is offered at a set price for up to 6 people. It is a private tour with skip the line access for you and your group - NO others will be added to your group. *Please note that the museum entrance tickets are not included in the tour price. You can buy them directly on the museum website or we will send you the link once you have booked the tour. Museum entrance tickets are free for -18 years old, however a free ticket still needs to be obtained.

entities.name: Paris Louvre Museum Must-See Skip-the-Line Private & Tailored Guided Tour

entities.departureInfo: Near the Eiffel Tower, central Paris

descriptions.shortDescription:
Embark on one of our cruise boats and discover all the secrets of Paris thanks to the expert knowledge of our guide by passing by the most emblematic monuments of Paris: the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame Cathedral, Orsay Museum, Louvre Museum, Grand Palais ... This cruise has been created in order to surprise you between breathtaking views of the monuments on the docks of the Seine river and unique comments. Parisians or visitors, adults or children, wonderement assured.
The best way to visit Paris, guaranteed without blister on your feet!

Drinks and snacks options available:
- Time for a Treat : a crêpe or a cookie + a soft drink, to get at the bar on board
- Parisian Pic-Nic : a sandwich + a cookie + a soft drink, to get at the Café des Vedettes kiosk
- Gourmet Box : foie gras on bread + a glass of Sauternes wine, to get at the Café des Vedettes kiosk

entities.name: Seine River Guided Cruise and Snacks Options by Vedettes de Paris

entities.departureInfo: 9 Rue Guénégaud, 75006 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Quiz Room is a unique activity in the world where you can buzz like on TV but with your group of friends, family or business. Immersed in a set of TV sets is added a fun dimension: sleeves and jokers that promote interactions between participants and that will allow you, also thanks to accessible and fun questions, to spend an unforgettable moment!

entities.name: Odéon Quiz Room

descriptions.shortDescription:
Eco Tuk Tuk offers you a 120-minute trip through the city of Madrid. A contact with the capital of Spain in which our guides will be able to point out the most relevant areas of the city and discover its secrets. It is a perfect way to get a broad idea of everything you can enjoy in the city on your travel days. And also the best possible photographic tour for the traveler.

Turn your stay in Madrid into an unforgettable experience and take home a great memory of this wonderful city!

We comply with the measures for the reduction of contagion by COVID19 of the Ministry of Health of Spain for guides and means of transport.

* Note: in winter the tuk-tuk have protective layers against rain and wind. They also have blankets so that our clients do not get cold.

entities.name: Private 2-Hour Guided Tour in Orsay Museum Paris

entities.departureInfo: Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Feel like a unique visit, source of good mood, sharing and the unexpected?
Re-discover the charms of Paris through a mind-blowing visit, in one of the most legendary convertible cars! Welcomed by a knowledgeable, kind and elegant chauffeur, dressed in the famous Saint James smock, you’ll enjoy the funny, unprecedented anecdotes, shared with passion. Wonderful avenues, famous monuments…. go with the flow of the must-see sights of the capital, from the soft seats of this iconic French car.

Choose from several departure times in the morning, afternoon or evening and see attention-grabbing attractions like the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral, Opera Garnier and more!

entities.name: Private Tour: 2CV Paris City Highlights Tour

entities.departureInfo: Louvre Pyramid, 75001 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Feast your eyes on masterpieces that span from antiquity to the 20th century. Discover the best of the world famous Louvre Museum with a private professional tour guide who's knowledgable and passionate about art history. No need to wait in line with your skip-the-line ticket!

entities.name: Masterpieces of the Louvre: Private Skip-the-Line Tour

entities.departureInfo: 1: Quai Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France2: La Villette, 211 Avenue Jean Jaurès, 75019 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Cruise the waters of the River Seine before enjoying a unique view of old Paris from the Canal Saint Martin. See many of the major attractions of Paris from the water including Notre Dame and The Louvre. Pass through tunnels, locks and under bridges as you cruise through some of the Parisian neighborhoods less popular with tourists and explore the city from the water. Choose a morning or afternoon departure to best fit your schedule.
For Christmas Holidays, we offer the breakfast the morning, and a snack on the afternoon. Children will enjoy make up activities the afternoon ! It is a special offer ! Book Now !

entities.name: Seine River Cruise and Paris Canals Tour
entities.returnInfo: 1: La Villette, 211 Avenue Jean Jaurès, 75019 Paris, France2: Quai Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: Place Blanche, Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Explore the cobbled streets of Montmartre, the fabled 2,000-year-old district that was once home to the world’s leading artists. Taste one of the best butter croissants in all of Paris. Find one of the best (and little-known) panoramas in Paris for a perfect city shot. Discover the Sacre-Coeur Basilica from a different angle. Stumble upon the last remaining vineyard in Paris, opposite one of its most iconic cabaret clubs Agile. This small group tour is limited to maximum 12 guests.

entities.name: Paris Hidden Montmartre Small-Group Walking Tour
entities.returnInfo: Sacré-Cœur Basilica, 1 Parvis du Sacré-Cœur, 75018 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: Allée des Refuzniks, 75007 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Make the most of your visit to the City of Light and check off the top items on your “must-see” list of Paris on this full-day, guided walking tour.  Ascend by elevator to the Summit of The Eiffel Tower. Your guide will lead you up the Eiffel Tower, cruise on the River Seine, pass by the Notre Dame Cathedral, over the Pont Neuf bridge, stroll leisurely along the banks of the river and finally to the iconic Louvre Pyramid at the foot of the famous Historique Axis of Paris. See and do more in 6 hours than most people do in three days with our fun-filled Full Day Tour.

entities.name: Paris Full-Day "Must See" Highlights Guided Tour

entities.departureInfo: Ô Chateau, 68 Rue Jean-Jacques Rousseau, 75001 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Enjoy a wonderful wine tasting in Paris with an expert sommelier guide. Taste wines from regions such as Bordeaux, Sancerre and Rhone, and listen as your guide takes you through the wine-tasting process and offers interesting insight into the wine regions of France. Combine your wine tasting with samplings of delicious cheese and charcuterie (cured meats like sausage and ham). Relax in an elegant wine cellar right in the heart of Paris and enjoy this delicious lunchtime tour!

THIS TOUR IS ONLY AVAILABLE ON ENGLISH.

entities.name: Paris Wine Tasting plus Cheese & Cured Meat Lunch with an Expert Sommelier Guide

entities.departureInfo: Le Grenier à Pain Caulaincourt, 127 Rue Caulaincourt, 75018 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Go behind the scenes of a French bakery and learn the secrets of French breads and pastries on this delectable Paris tour. You'll tour the production rooms of an artisanal Parisian bakery and see first-hand how classic French breads and pastries are made.

entities.name: Behind the Scenes of a Boulangerie: French Bakery Tour in Paris

We provide hotel pick-up if guests are staying in a Central Paris District (Arrondissement) except the following districts: 75010, 75011, 75012, 75013, 75018, 75019, 75020 where pick-up is not available.

descriptions.shortDescription: Discover the Normandy D-Day sites on this day-trip, from Paris to the beaches of Normandy, in a small-group. Your will travel in the comfort of a van (Maximum of eight participants) to guarantee more intimacy. Visit Point du Hoc and its famous cliffs, the American Cemetery in Colleville with its 9,387 Headstones, as well as German Bunkers, plus walk on the sadly famous Omaha Beach also called “Bloody Omaha“. You day with your guide will be filled of Memories you'll never forget. When booking, you'll have the option to include hotel pickup or not.

entities.name: Normandy Small-Group Day Trip D-Day Battlefields & Landing Beaches from Paris

entities.departureInfo: Shakespeare and Company, 37 Rue de la Bûcherie, 75005 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Receive a warm welcome to Paris on a private tour that will kick off your time in the city in the best way possible! In only 90 minutes, a local guide will get you acquainted with Paris to help you enjoy the rest of your stay to the fullest.

Discover where to find Notre Dame and Jardin du Luxembourg, and how to explore them away from the crowds. And what about that unique family-owned restaurant or that amazing local hotspot? We got you covered; the local guides are experts in the subject! Forget about touristy traps; on this city kickstart tour, your guide will point you in the right direction.

Private City Kickstart Tour: Paris is one of Withlocals' signature tours available in major cities worldwide. We work with passionate local guides who earn a fair fee. We support local economies by only offering local produce and prevent over-tourism with only small non-intrusive groups. Our tours are carbon-neutral and away from the standard tourist routes.

entities.name: Private City Kickstart Tour: Paris

entities.departureInfo: How to become Parisian in one hour?, 24 boulevard Poissonniere Theatre des Nouveautes, 75009 Paris France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Hailed by The New York Times as 'Learning to be French through comedy!', enjoyed by more than 800 000 SPECTATORS & rated 'Certificate of excellence' since 2015 on TripAdvisor, this SMASH HIT SHOW is The ultimate Parisian theatre experience 100% in english in Paris! 

Olivier Giraud will teach you how to act like a real Parisian in every situations encountered during your stay in Paris (in a taxi, shop, metro, restaurant, night club and beyond ...).  A Perfect night out surrounded by Parisians and a cosmopolitan audience, in a century old theatre (600 seats) located in the lively heart of Paris (Opéra area) ... Ohlala !

entities.name: How to Become a Parisian in 1 Hour? The Hit Comedy Show 100% in English in Paris

entities.departureInfo: 22 Rue Jean Rey, 75015 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Mont St. Michel, or “The Wonder of the West”, is one of France’s top attractions and the most popular destination in Normandy. Our day-trip transports you to this UNESCO World Heritage Site on a comfortable coach ride from Paris, taking in the landscapes of Normandy along the way. As you approach this unique island, you’ll catch your first glimpse of its famous 10th-century gothic abbey. You’ll have four hours to lunch and explore at your leisure, with your multi-language audio guide. Wander through the village and its steep streets, visit the abbey with its medieval architecture, hunt out picture-postcard views across the Atlantic, and watch as the tide rises around the island. Don’t forget to taste local, seasonal products in the traditional décor of one of the many eateries. We’ve negotiated preferential offers in several restaurants, as well as discounts in shops and museums. The island is yours to enjoy at your own pace, before you return to Paris by coach.

entities.name: Mont Saint-Michel Audio Guided Day Trip with Abbey Entrance from Paris

entities.departureInfo: Cité de l'architecture et du patrimoine, 1 Place du Trocadéro et du 11 Novembre, 75016 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Save hours of waiting time as you whiz past the long lines with your hassle-free Skip-the-Line Access ticket to the Eiffel Tower on this 1-hour tour. Start from Trocadéro Plaza with a short, but informative commentary from your expert guide who will offer you insights into the fascinating history of the “Dame de Fer”. Then, with your direct entry ticket, stroll past the lines to ascend in the elevator for your self-guided visit of the 1st and 2nd floors (and the Summit, if you select the option) for breath-taking panoramic views of the City of Light.

entities.name: Eiffel Tower Tour with Reserved Entrance and Summit

entities.departureInfo: Lido de Paris, 116 B avenue des Champs Elysees, 75008 Paris France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Enjoy an evening of glitzy, glamorous cabaret and a delicious 3-course dinner at Paris’ brand new Lido de Paris "Paris Merveilles" show. Head to the city’s famous Avenue des Champs-Elysées and discover a world of decadent dancers, sparkling sequins, extraordinary sets, magical lighting and captivating music. With the delectable Bluebell girls on stage and talented chefs producing delicious dishes in the kitchen, take in the sights and sounds of one of Paris’ newest and most impressive cabaret performances. Dreamlike and tantalizing, the show's sets offer a tour de force of imagination and excitement! 

 Lido de Paris is free for children under 11* 
 *Not applicable for special nights like Christmas and New Year's Eve. For Soirees Etoile, Champs Elysees, and Triomphe, beverages are not included in children menu.

entities.name: Lido de Paris Cabaret Dinner Show Ticket

descriptions.shortDescription: 2-hour Louvre tour with a professional English speaking guide. Small group with a maximum of 6 people. Quick access at the museum without queuing. Louvre ticket reusable after the visit.

entities.name: Louvre Museum Small Group English Guided Tour
entities.returnInfo: Louvre Museum, Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris, France

entities.departureInfo: Le Panthéon, Place du Panthéon, 75005 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription:
Experience the best travel stories for yourself! Join a local expert and uncover hidden gems on this Lonely Planet Experience powered by Urban Adventures. Get a taste of ‘la vie bohème’ on a 3.5-hour small-group walking tour of Paris’ arty neighborhoods: Saint-Germain-des-Prés and the Latin Quarter. Learn of the areas’ famous poets and artists on a walk, and then enjoy two activities that the French hold dear to their hearts: drinking a glass of wine and playing a game of French 'boules' (balls) known as Pétanque! 

Numbers are limited to 12 on this small-group tour, ensuring you can explore like a local.

entities.name: Lonely Planet Experiences: Paris Food & Drink Tour Of Saint-Germain

entities.departureInfo: Le Petit Mitron, 22 Rue Mouton-Duvernet, 75014 Paris, France

descriptions.shortDescription: Learn how to make classic French baguettes and croissants with an expert Parisian baker during this two-hour baking workshop. Using recipes handed down for generations, you’ll discover the baker’s secrets of creating the perfect bread. This hands-on experience takes place behind the scenes of a traditional French bakery in Paris, and of course includes tastings of fresh baguettes and croissants! This small-group experience is limited to eight people, ensuring you’ll receive personal attention from your instructor.

entities.name: French Baking Class: Baguettes and Croissants in a Parisian Bakery
